snippet: Regional cooperation is essential to battle threats that transcend borders.
abstract: Op-Ed article by history teacher Sunil S Amrith warns scale and pace of changes to area around Bay of Bengal due to population growth and climate change demand urgent, regional cooperation; calls on Asian countries that ring the bay to rise above their political fault lines and embrace the interconnectedness of their history.
lead_paragraph: Regional cooperation is essential to battle threats that transcend borders.
